page.title: 02A 303
page.content: Windsors garage has been on the A303 since 1927.At that time petrol was sold in 2 gallon cans.Now petrol is sold from electronic pumps.Heaviest traffic passing the garage was in 1976-1978.Then the M5 motorway was opened. Many foreign people call, mostly Dutch and German. These famous people have called Ned Sherrin,Frank Muir, Nerys Hughes. He has had a lot of requests, "Are there souvenirs at Cadbury Castle ? "Is there a tea house there?" Americans came for a weekend on Concorde and were driven around in a limousine. They came to see Cadbury Castle.Mr. Windsor thinks that it will be much quieter when the by-pass is built.Travellers would like a picnic area and toilets. The by-pass and a playing field would improve the life
